entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Lansdowne House
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:35 a.m. EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.3Â°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
